title: 5.1 Build Cycling Power Chart view
description: Create PowerChartView.vue with D3 line chart for power over time. Activity selector dropdown. Show avg/max power, time in zones. Highlight sustained efforts vs sprints.

title: Install Mapbox GL JS and configure environment
description: Install mapbox-gl package, add VITE_MAPBOX_TOKEN env variable placeholder, update .env.example if exists. Remove leaflet dependency after migration.
close_reason: Installed mapbox-gl 3.18.1 and @types/mapbox-gl 3.4.1, added VITE_MAPBOX_TOKEN to .env.example

title: Checkpoint: Verify ActivityDetailView redesign
description: Run quality checks (lint, type-check). Verify map loads with Mapbox. Test responsive layout. Close completed tasks.
close_reason: Verified: type-check passes, lint passes. Build has pre-existing Node.js version issue (v20.10.0 vs required v20.19+)

title: 5.2 Build My Activities List view
description: Create ActivitiesListView.vue with scrollable activity cards. Each card: type icon, title, date, distance, time, elevation, pace. Search bar, filters (date range, sport type, distance sliders).

title: Redesign ActivityDetailView to match Strava layout with Mapbox
close_reason: ActivityDetailView redesigned: Strava-style header with inline stats, Mapbox GL JS replacing Leaflet (outdoors style, navigation controls, style toggle, fullscreen, GPX export), redesigned elevation/laps/splits sections

title: Replace Leaflet map with Mapbox GL
description: Replace Leaflet with Mapbox GL JS. Use Outdoors style for terrain. Add start/end markers with proper icons. Fit bounds to route with padding. Handle missing polyline gracefully.
close_reason: Full ActivityDetailView redesign complete: Strava-style header with inline stats, Mapbox GL JS map with controls (style toggle, fullscreen, GPX export), redesigned laps/splits tables with metric tabs

title: 2.6 Checkpoint: Verify Phase 2 (Data layer working)
description: CHECKPOINT: Run unit tests for fitness model and aggregations. Verify data fetching works. Review changes, commit, close tasks.

title: Add year selector component with teal styling
description:
Create a reusable YearSelector Vue component:
- Calculate available years from activity data
- Teal color (#009688) for toggle buttons  
- Active/hover states matching design system
- Emit selected year for filtering

Acceptance criteria:
- Component renders years from data range
- Teal styling applied correctly
- Works independently from existing time range selectors

title: Final Checkpoint: Full workflow completion
description:
Final verification of all improvements:
1. Run full test suite
2. Manual testing of all views
3. Performance check (no regressions)
4. Review all changes
5. Final commit and push
6. Close parent task

title: Monthly Fitness: Add year selector and fix legend/tooltips
description:
Integrate year selector and fix UX issues:
- Add YearSelector component to page header
- Filter data by selected year
- Fix hover tooltips to show 'Fitness: X' instead of 'CTL: X'
- Update legend to use user-friendly terms
- Connect 'Understanding Your Form' section to actual chart zones

Acceptance criteria:
- Year selector filters chart data
- Tooltips show Fitness/Fatigue/Form labels
- Legend matches chart lines
- Form zones section explains current visible data

title: Checkpoint: Verify Phase 2 - Monthly Fitness
description:
Verify Monthly Fitness improvements:
1. Run quality checks
2. Test line toggles work correctly
3. Test year selector filters data
4. Verify tooltips show friendly labels
5. Commit and close tasks

Acceptance criteria:
- All Monthly Fitness tasks complete
- Feature works end-to-end

title: 1.3 Implement Google Sign-In flow
description: Implement Firebase Google Sign-In matching Android pattern. Store token in localStorage. Add allowed-email check. Create auth store in Pinia.

title: Activities: Add mini-map thumbnails with Leaflet
description:
Add mini route maps to activity cards:
- Create ActivityMiniMap component using Leaflet
- Render polyline from map_summary_polyline
- Small static thumbnail (no interaction needed)
- Placeholder (grey box with map icon) when no GPS data
- Fit to activity card layout

Acceptance criteria:
- Map thumbnail shows route preview
- Placeholder shown for activities without GPS
- Maps don't affect page load significantly (lazy load)
- Consistent sizing across all cards

title: 1.2 Configure Supabase client and environment
description: Set up Supabase client in Vue app, configure env variables for SUPABASE_URL and SUPABASE_ANON_KEY. Create composable for Supabase access.

title: 2.5 Create aggregation utilities
description: Create aggregations.ts with functions: groupByWeek, groupByMonth, calculateWeeklyIntensity, calculateSportBreakdown, calculateStreaks. Include unit tests.

title: Weekly Intensity: Add year selector and show 16 weeks
description:
Update Weekly Intensity view:
- Add YearSelector component (teal)
- Change 'Recent Weeks' from 8 to 16
- Filter bar chart by selected year
- Adjust week count options if needed

Acceptance criteria:
- Year selector works correctly
- Recent weeks shows 16 items
- Data filtered by year

title: Monthly Fitness: Add line visibility toggles
description:
Add checkboxes to toggle Fitness/Fatigue/Form lines:
- Three checkbox toggles above/beside the chart
- State persists during session
- Chart re-renders when toggled
- Labeled clearly (Fitness, Fatigue, Form - not CTL/ATL/TSB)

Acceptance criteria:
- Each line can be toggled independently
- At least one line must remain visible
- Smooth transition when toggling

title: Phase 4: Analytics Views (Part 1)
description: Implement Training Log, Weekly Intensity, and Monthly Fitness views with D3 visualizations.

title: 3.2 Set up dashboard routes
description: Configure vue-router with routes: /dashboard (default), /training-log, /power-chart, /weekly-intensity, /monthly-fitness, /activities, /sports, /activity/:id. Add route guards.

title: 6.2 Integrate Leaflet route map
description: Add interactive Leaflet map with polyline from activity. Map controls (zoom, fullscreen, style toggle). Decode summary_polyline. Highlight segments on hover from charts.
close_reason: Phase 5 verified and Leaflet map already implemented with polyline, markers, and routing

title: 2.4 Implement Banister fitness model (isolated module)
description: Create fitnessModel.ts with Banister impulse-response implementation. Calculate daily training load from HR/power. Compute ATL, CTL, TSB. Design for easy replacement. Include unit tests.

title: 1.4 Create Login screen component
description: Build LoginView.vue with Google Sign-In button, loading state, error handling. Style similar to Android LoginScreen. Add route guard for protected routes.

title: Dashboard UI improvements and Strava-like features
description:
Comprehensive UI improvements to match Strava's design patterns:

**Monthly Fitness:**
- Checkboxes to toggle Fitness/Fatigue/Form lines
- Year selector buttons (teal color) for 2025, 2024, 2023, etc.
- Fix legend to match chart elements
- Improve hover tooltip labels (show Fitness/Fatigue/Form instead of CTL/ATL/TSB)

**Power Chart:**
- Implement true Power Curve (best efforts across time intervals)
- Period comparison feature
- Match Strava's power curve visualization

**Training Log:**
- Research and match Strava's calendar design
- Year selector buttons (teal)

**Weekly Intensity:**
- Year selector buttons (teal)
- Show 16 recent weeks instead of 8

**Sports Breakdown:**
- Remove emoji icons from treemap
- Sport-specific view components with tailored metrics
- Query DB for top 15 most used sports

**Activities:**
- Mini-map thumbnails for GPS activities
- Photo indicators
- Placeholder for activities without GPS/photos

title: 3.1 Create dashboard layout component
description: Create DashboardLayout.vue with sidebar navigation, header with user info/logout, main content area. Make responsive for mobile (collapsible sidebar).

title: Phase 7: Final Polish & Integration
description: Final integration, styling polish, error handling, and deployment preparation.

title: Power Chart: Implement Strava-style Power Curve
description:
Replace current power-over-time scatter with true Power Curve:
- Calculate best average power for intervals: 5s, 15s, 30s, 1m, 2m, 3m, 5m, 8m, 10m, 15m, 20m, 30m, 45m, 1hr, 2hr
- Logarithmic x-axis for time intervals
- Smooth curve through best efforts
- Period comparison (select two time periods)
- Click on curve point to see which activity achieved it
- Toggle Watts vs Watts/kg (requires athlete weight)

Acceptance criteria:
- Power curve displays correctly with log scale
- Clicking points shows activity link
- Two periods can be compared visually
- Matches Strava's general appearance

title: Phase 3: Dashboard Layout & Navigation
description: Create main dashboard layout with sidebar navigation, responsive design, and view routing.

description: Create D3 elevation profile from altitude stream. Area chart with gradient fill. Show gain/loss. Smooth noise with threshold. Interactive hover synced with map.

description: Implement the full Activity Details screen with interactive map, stats grid, and performance charts.

title: 6.1 Build Activity Details header and overview
description: Create ActivityDetailView.vue header: activity type+title, date/time, action buttons (share, edit). Achievement badges. At-a-glance stat grid (distance, duration, pace, elevation, cadence). Tappable tiles.

title: Update MonthlyFitnessView to ensure continuous date range with natural decay
description: Fitness model already handles gaps with decay. Verify chart shows continuous line from first to last data point. CTL/ATL should decay naturally during rest periods.

title: Update DashboardView to use horizontal grid layout for stats cards
description: Stats cards should display in a responsive horizontal row on desktop (4 cards in a row) and stack appropriately on mobile. Recent activities should also use wider layout.

description: Run all quality checks, lint, type check, build. Review all changes. Close completed tasks. Push to remote.

title: Training Log: Match Strava calendar design
description:
Update Training Log to match Strava's design:
- Circle-based activity indicators (not squares)
- Color-coded by sport type
- Weekly overview with jump-to navigation
- Sport type filtering
- Display mode toggle (time/distance/elevation)
- Add year selector (teal)

Acceptance criteria:

- Sport colors are consistent with rest of app
- Week navigation works smoothly

title: 2.3 Create Pinia activities store
description: Create useActivitiesStore with state for activities list, current activity, loading states. Actions for fetching, filtering, pagination. Computed getters for derived data.

title: Sports Breakdown: Create sport-specific view components
description:
Create tailored view components for different sports:
- Define sport-metric mapping (e.g., RockClimbing: no distance, show time/grade)
- Create SportDetailCard component with dynamic metrics
- Hide irrelevant metrics per sport type
- Show sport-appropriate stats:
  * Running: pace, distance, elevation, cadence
  * Cycling: power, distance, speed, elevation
  * Swimming: distance (laps), time, pace per 100m
  * RockClimbing: time, elevation (if available), count
  * Hiking: distance, elevation, time
  * WeightTraining: time, count
  * Yoga: time, count

Acceptance criteria:
- Each sport shows only relevant metrics
- No distance for indoor/climbing activities
- Graceful handling of missing data
